thread.title: Grammys 2017: Blue Ivy Wears a Gucci Prince-Inspired Suit
thread.title_full: Grammys 2017: Blue Ivy Wears a Gucci Prince-Inspired Suit

title: Grammys 2017: Blue Ivy Wears a Gucci Prince-Inspired Suit
text: Blue Ivy Pays an Adorable Tribute to Prince in Gucci February 13, 2017 2:35 AM by Marjon Carlos Kevin Mazur As the offspring of musical giants Beyoncé and Jay Z , Blue Ivy Carter has always seemed destined to inherit the creative gene—and perhaps follow in her parents’ footsteps. But who knew she would be displaying such artistic acumen so early on? Sitting front row tonight at the Grammy Awards to take in her mother’s deific performance, Blue was actually paying homage to another great musical legend. Suited up in a pink custom Gucci pantsuit, the pint-size style star layered her look with a frilled high-neck white blouse underneath a miniature rendition of the very flouncy top that Prince made his fashion calling card over the years. Demonstrating her command of music history, Blue fastened the top with a diamond brooch akin to the one Prince donned in Purple Rain . She did, however, forgo a Purple One–inspired pompadour—though her sleek, high ponytail did the foppish rock legend plenty of justice.
